name: Far Far Away
description:
Far Far Away is a fast paced simple hybrid of arena shooter and board game in which the played will have to fight as a pawn on a board with really unique and stylized graphics with minimal in game UI.

There are two game modes in this game

-Battle Mode in which player has to kill the enemy 10 times the death is denoted by the skulls at the edges of the board, the player can use different abilities and perks against the enemy to win.
-Puzzle Mode in which a player has to set the board and rebound the blade a specific time to pass.
-Stats screen records the stats of the player.
